title: 2018 Macbook Air A1932 Finger print button replacement
message:
Hello all. My local Mac repair place told me they did a hardware check on this unit and said the actual fingerprint button failed and would need to be replaced. Is this something I can do without taking it to them? Everything else works on this unit but that. They told me that they would program the button to the logic board. 

FYI when pressing the power button it works just fine, it just does not see fingerprint hardware to set up new fingerprints.

Thanks

title: 2018 Macbook Air A1932 Finger print button replacement
message:
Touch ID is paired with motherboard in T2 chip.
If you really need fingerprint to work, must go to Apple...

title: 2018 Macbook Air A1932 Finger print button replacement
message: That's what I needed to know. Thanks again!
